alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; East Cameron; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 6:45PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CAMERON...CENTRAL JEFFERSON DAVIS...SOUTH CENTRAL BEAUREGARD AND CALCASIEU PARISHES THROUGH 730 PM CST... At 645 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Leblanc to near Johnsons Bayou. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Jennings, Cameron, Westlake, Welsh, Vinton, Iowa, Grand Lake, Hayes, Moss Bluff, Johnsons Bayou, Ragley, Lacassine National Wildlife Refuge, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Sabine National Wildlife, Hacketts Corner, Topsy, Lebleu Settlement, and Gillis. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 8 and 59. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for southwestern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Beauregard; East Cameron; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; West Cameron
